Da:
Watermark D.a. can be distinguished by a very scrawny line quality and the initials VA below the shield.

________________________________________________________________________

This watermark can be found on the following prints:

  • Jan Cornelisz Sylvius, preacher (1564-1638),1633, (B. 266 unknown state/NHD 124 ?), Amsterdams Historisch Museum (AHM A.11127)

(Erik Hinterding, Rembrandt as an Etcher, 2006, II, 63)
